LanguageData.HerbalMedicine.label: Raw Healroot
LanguageData.HerbalMedicine.description: A pack of herbal concoctions typically extracted from the Healroot Plant. It is less potent than industrial pharmaceuticals.
LanguageData.Medicine.label: Medicine
LanguageData.Medicine.description: Medicine is a combination of various medical supplies that medical personnel can use to heal the wounded.
LanguageData.GlitterworldMedicine.label: Advanced Medicine
LanguageData.GlitterworldMedicine.description: Advanced medical supplies from a high-tech GlitterWorld. A more potent version of standard medicine that can greatly aid in even the most serious of injuries.
LanguageData.HerbMedicine.label: Herbal Medicine
LanguageData.HerbMedicine.description: Herbal Medicine is a basic collection of plant-based supplies that medical staff use to treat the wounded.
